solution_line_template: Since Liam used {parts_used} parts, then he used {length_per_part} x {parts_used} = <<{parts_used}*{length_per_part}={ribbon_used}>>{ribbon_used} meters of the ribbon.
So, {total_ribbon_length} - {ribbon_used} = <<{total_ribbon_length}-{ribbon_used}={ribbon_not_used}>>{ribbon_not_used} meters of ribbon is not used.
